Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1985
Subject: Billy Wallace learns new position
Billy Wallace has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Rightfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Oswaldo Jimenez
Dear Sir,
Oswaldo Jimenez is hitting the ball well at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .277, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Status of Terrance Charles
Dear Sir,
Terrance Charles shouldn't play at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .232 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
